about_the_game:
Falos Demo: A Sneak Peek into the World of Language Learning

Step into the world of Falos with our exclusive demo, where you'll get a taste of the groundbreaking language learning experience that awaits in the full game. In this demo, you'll dive into the Gorilla Jumper game mode, where your quick thinking and precision will be put to the test as you leap from one emoji to the next, matching them to the correct words.

What’s Included in the Demo

Gorilla Jumper Game Mode: Experience the thrill of learning through play as you navigate levels by jumping onto the correct emojis that match the displayed words. This mode challenges your accuracy and speed, making language learning fun and engaging.

Explore 20+ Unique Languages:

The demo focuses on less common and culturally significant languages, giving you the chance to expand your linguistic horizons in a meaningful way. The languages available in the demo pack include:
Armenian
Welsh
Estonian
Esperanto
Finnish
Filipino
Tagalog
Hausa
Hawaiian
Hebrew
Icelandic
Indonesian
Igbo
Irish
Scots Gaelic
Khmer
Mongolian
Nepali
Polish
Sanskrit
Samoan
Vietnamese
Yiddish
Ukrainian
Uzbek
Zulu

This curated selection of languages offers a glimpse into the diverse linguistic tapestry of our world, allowing you to start your journey in learning words that carry deep cultural significance.

Why Play the Falos Demo?

A Taste of Innovation: Get a feel for Falos’ unique approach to language learning, combining fun gameplay with meaningful education.
Challenge Yourself: See how well you can match emojis to words in this fast-paced game mode, and discover how quickly you can start picking up new vocabulary.
Cultural Exploration: Engage with languages that might be new to you, each one offering a window into a different culture

Join the Falos Adventure

This demo is just the beginning. In the full version of Falos, you’ll have access to over 100 languages and four diverse game modes that make learning an adventure. But for now, jump into the demo, explore these fascinating languages, and see how Falos can make language learning a thrilling and rewarding experience. Whether you're just starting out or looking to expand your linguistic knowledge, Falos is here to guide you on an exciting journey of discovery.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Falos Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fun + Language Learning! Falos Demo: Jump to emojis, learning 100+ words for 20+ languages.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
